item.title: Terraform Cdk
item.description: Introduction We will be exploring the terraform-cdk toolkit in this article. We shall be using an AWS account to spin up a VM. We shall be doing following. Create A brand New VPC (Not touching existing default VPC) Create 3 subnets ( 1 public, 2 private) A security Group to allow incoming SSH traffic and allow all outgoing. A key-pair for ssh An additional internet-gateway in AWS (It is needed to get internet connectity to new VPC.
